content: scrap happy christmas ornaments crochet pattern by sara sach thank you for purchasing a posh pooch designs dog clothes original pattern i have done my best to keep my patterns simple and easy to understand if at any time you need assistance please feel free to contact me at the email below please remember that there may be a slight variance in sizing due to different tensions of each individual and materials used all patterns are copyright protected whether free or paid this includes all photography you are welcome to sell finished products made from my patterns i do ask however that you mention my company name i would love to see your finished products if you would like to send me pictures these will be for my personal use only and will not be posted anywhere without prior written permission from you enjoy sara sach ssach@poshpoochdesigns com 1 scrap happy christmas ornaments crochet pattern skill easy materials crochet hook h / 5 mm yarn med 4 acrylic 1 oz assorted colors yarn needle think ribbon 18 inches \long flat plastic ornaments 3 15 inches optional - polyfiberfil stuffing- about a handful assorted buttons and appliques of choice for decoration stitches chain chain slipstitch slip_stitch double_crochet double_crochet size 3 5 inches notes ch3 counts as a double_crochet color changes are not indicated in the pattern when changing colors ch3 after the color change 2 pattern make 2 r 1 ch5 join in a circle ch3 9 double_crochet in the circle join to the ch3 with a slip_stitch 10 double_crochet r 2 - slip_stitch between the next 2 double_crochet ch3 double_crochet *2 double_crochet between the next 2 double_crochet* repeat from * to * around join to the chain 3 with a slip_stitch 20 double_crochet r 3 - slip_stitch between the next 2 double_crochet ch3 double_crochet *2 double_crochet between the next 2 double_crochet 1 double_crochet between the next 2 double_crochet* repeat from * to * around join to the chain 3 with a slip_stitch 30dc 3 r 4 single_crochet in each of the double_crochet around join to the 1st single_crochet with a slip_stitch tie off weave in the ends 30sc repeat r 1 r 4 do not cut your yarn place the 2 circles together right sides facing out single_crochet crochet the 2 circles together for the plastic ornament leave space to slide in the ornament slide the ornament in and cut yarn leaving a 12 inch tail of yarn use a needle and tail of yarn to secure the sides of the ornament 4 for stuffing stuff the ornament and stitch closed add decorations and a ribbon hanger 5
